鷆字的基本解释

鷆
tián
同“鷏”。

鷆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tián］
［《廣韻》徒年切，平定，定。］
亦作“鷆1”。
蚊母鸟的别名。见明李时珍《本草纲目·禽一·蚊母鸟》。

鷆字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷆； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1498第03
【廣韻】徒年切【集韻】亭年切，?音田。【爾雅·釋鳥】鷆，蟁母。【郭註】似烏?而大，黃白雜文，鳴如鴿聲，今江東呼爲蚊母。又名吐蚊鳥。【嶺南異物志】吐蚊鳥大如靑鷁，大觜，食魚。又【集韻】之人切，音眞。又多年切，音顚。義?同。

鷆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷆字的起名意思

暂无。

Gai
Basic explanation of words
Gai
tián
Same as "鷏".
Gai
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tián］
["Guangyun" cuts for years, calms down, and settles. ]
Also known as "鷆1".
Alias for the mosquito female bird. See Ming Li Shizhen "Compendium of Materia Medica·Avian I·Mosquito Mother Bird".
Gai
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷆; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1498 No. 03
[Guang Yun] Cut in the Year of the Tu[Ji Yun] Cut in the Year of the Pavilion,? Yintian. [Erya·Shiniao] Xi, Jiao mother. [Guo's Note] It looks like black but big, yellow and white essays, singing like a dove, now Jiangdong is called a mosquito mother. Also known as spitting mosquitoes. [Lingnan Foreign Body History] Mosquitoes are as big as grebes, big horns, and fish-eating. Also [Jiyun] the people cut, the sound is 眞. After many years of cutting, Yin Xi. Righteous? Same.
Gai
